tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE refurbishment_tracking_table (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    refurbishment_date DATE,
    refurbishment_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    resale_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE resale (
  resale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  component_id INT,
  resale_date DATE,
  resale_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  sold_to_company VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE tracking (
  tracking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  component_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  tracking_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE component_sale (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    buyer_name VARCHAR(255)
);
